com.yantra.ycp.japi

Interface YCPCustomBlobHandler


  • public interface YCPCustomBlobHandler
    Provides conversion between binary data and a String. If an implementation of this interface is registered in xapi.properties, it can be used to provide translations during API calls.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String blobToString(org.w3c.dom.Element templateElem, java.io.InputStream in)
      Convert the given input stream to an XML-safe String.
      void stringToBlob(org.w3c.dom.Element inputElem, java.lang.String in, java.io.OutputStream destStream)
      Convert the given input String to binary data for storage in the database.

    • Method Detail

      • blobToString

        java.lang.String blobToString(org.w3c.dom.Element templateElem,
                              java.io.InputStream in)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              YFSException
        Convert the given input stream to an XML-safe String. templateElem Template Element corresponding to the output blob element. in InputStream referencing the blob data. A String that can be safely set as XML data.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        YFSException

      • stringToBlob

        void stringToBlob(org.w3c.dom.Element inputElem,
                  java.lang.String in,
                  java.io.OutputStream destStream)
           throws java.io.IOException,
                  YFSException
        Convert the given input String to binary data for storage in the database. inputElem The input element corresponding to the blob. in The String data in this input element. destStream Stream to write binary data to. The implementation should not close this stream.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        YFSException
